subject: Re: For bruce:
author: DAna
full_text:
doing that now lol but thanks i figured i was behind....hints why i 
had no clue about the two way, all my fault though, thanks you so 
much for that though.. i should have done it from the start of 
things                                                                
                                                                      
     --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Lisby <lisby@...> wrote:
>
> D'Ana-- this list is full of people doing two-way communication. 
You  
> may want to google "Frank's box" and do some reading to catch up 
to  
> where we are.
> 
> Welcome  aboard.
> 
> Ann
> 
> On Jan 2, 2008, at 6:56 PM, DAna wrote:
> 
> > it was where he was asking his dad somethionog that is all i
> > know regarding the one i listened to. that makes more sense though
> > for some odd reason there arent any others that have brought up 
two
> > way communication so im afraid i was wrong! Thanks for doin that 
for
> > me and bruce. I am glad there is other ways that specialize in
> > communicating with the deceased. i have no clue why i have never
> > heard of that but thanks for the heads up...tons of things 
everyone
> > isnt aware of.. so you answered the one i wanted
> > answered .
> >
> >
> >
> > --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Lisby <lisby@> wrote:
> > >
> > > That isn't his dad--it's Mike, his guide.
> > >
> > > What you're hearing are artifacts of the sound clean-up program
> > that
> > > makes the voices more audible.
> > >
> > > These are not EVPs, they are realtime communication. They are
> > heard
> > > out loud as they happen. That's what boxes do--they allow two-
way
> > > real-time exchange between us and them.
> > >
> > > Ann
> > >
> > > On Jan 2, 2008, at 4:16 PM, DAna wrote:
> > >
> > > > Now I am sure you arent aware of who I am being, noone else 
other
> > > > than misty welcomed me to this group. Being I am not 
professional
> > at
> > > > e.v.p.s but yet have gone through listening to many of them 
from
> > > > trustful resources, your e.v.p.s make me a bit leery. NOt 
trying
> > to
> > > > be rude, so dont go get all upset right off the bat. In your
> > e.v.p.s,
> > > > this one especially, alot of them sound like you, not the part
> > where
> > > > you asking questions, but where your dad is supposively 
answering
> > > > you. NOw everyone has their own right to opinion so there is 
now
> > need
> > > > to get defensive, if all is real there would be nothing to 
get mad
> > > > about. I just cant help but notice how odd it is that your 
e.v.p.
> > > > questions to your father, seems to answer right away when you 
ask
> > the
> > > > question. Also, i notice that after you ask the question i 
hear
> > > > something being turned on that has contains the answer to that
> > > > question. Whether it be your dad or not. I feel its you that 
is
> > > > answering, but let me tell you why i figure this.. and please 
you
> > > > would like to defend you side of things that would be great,
> > maybe i
> > > > would be able to change my opinion on the matter. But as of 
now,
> > > > e.v.p.s are usually done on the same tape that the questions 
are
> > on,
> > > > then in a rewind you can hear you and the e.v.p. but to me it
> > sound
> > > > like you put the e.v.p. response on another tape. i am not 
trying
> > to
> > > > start any kind of fight or be cruel, maybe i could learn
> > something on
> > > > behalf of how you do your work... thank you
> > > >
> > > >
> > > >
> > >
> >
> >
> >
>
